Key Match Events: Nikola Vucevic led the Bulls with 29 points
Dalen Terry got tangled up with Pistons center Isaiah Stewart and was calmed down by teammate Jalen Smith
Pre-Game Insights: The Bulls wanted to set a tone after being humiliated by the Rockets the night before
Post-Match Reflections: Bulls coach Billy Donovan saw a different attitude from his team
The Bulls' victory was a much-needed win after a lopsided loss to the Pacers
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bulls' win was a 122-112 victory over the Pistons
The game was played at Little Caesers Arena in Detroit
